sources.name: However, you CAN move and size things as you see fit.

settings.text:
This is a helper scene. It allows you to quickly 
change the sources by double clicking on each one 
in the Sources List. 

If you need to resize or change the type of input,
go to one of the embed scenes (at the end of the scenes list):

--[ embed ]-- Content
--[ embed ]-- PTZ Source
--[ embed ]-- Background

Each of the embed scenes is intended to show 1 thing.
The embed scenes are emebedded througout the template 
and resized according to their context.

By "abstracting" each source to a scene, this allows you to change
the type of input, rescale it to full screen, and have it repeated anywhere.

for example, you can use a hotkey to  switch between a capture card 
and a display output, or window capture from an application
